_header: By this tokening of the rood far from me mote flee
_description: The power of the symbol of the Cross to put evil to flight and give birth to all blessings — four lines in couplets

CamEmm27.Transcription:
Bi þis tokninge of þare rode for fram me mote floeAlle
                    wikkedhede boe wat hit euere boeAnd bi þat ulke tokninge mote boe
                    yboreweAlle þing þat blessed is aneuere and amorewe
CamEmm27.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 28.
